reviewText: Our family enjoys watching the Father Dowling Mysteries.This was a good price for this set of DVDS and I would definitely recommend this set of DVD's for anyone who enjoys watching Father Dowling
Title: Father Dowling Mysteries: The Complete Series

reviewText: Love, love love this series.  If you remember it you know you love it too.  Arrived fast. Highly recommend to young and old.  It is clean for family viewing.
Title: Father Dowling Mysteries: The Complete Series

reviewText: Great DVD set, very decent price and prompt shipment. Thank you for having this complete set for me to purchase. I am really enjoying all of the different episodes.
Title: Father Dowling Mysteries: The Complete Series

reviewText: I always watched the Father Dowling Mysteries on TV whenever they were on and I had the time.  They were on before I had a VCR and so I was at the mercy of the TV schedule and my personal schedule.  Now I can watch as much as I want whenever I want.  Makes the whole experience more enjoyable.
Title: Father Dowling Mysteries: The Complete Series

reviewText: It has been years since I saw Father Dowling Mysteries.  Great recall of memories.  Love Tracy Nelson as Sister Steve.
Title: Father Dowling Mysteries: The Complete Series

reviewText: Love this older series as it has humor and enjoyable characters. Very good family series for everyone to watch. Well worth purchasing even as a gift for someone older.
Title: Father Dowling Mysteries: The Complete Series

reviewText: Have all-but-finished viewing my DVDs for Father Dowling.  Great series, a truly loveable main character in Father Dowling.  His Sister Steve is adorable, they both work well together in this series.  Highly recommend to anyone who likes mysteries, but nice clean interesting viewing.
Title: Father Dowling Mysteries: The Complete Series

reviewText: The description for this set under "Format" describes this collection as a "Box Set."  It's not.  It's 3 separate season dvd's shrink-wrapped together.  One of my dvds were off the spindle so it has scratches on it.  If I had known that this wasn't an actual "Box Set" I probably wouldn't have bought it.  The three separate dvds they picture aren't even the ones you receive so that's deceptive too.  I'm not as disappointed as I am annoyed.  So if you're considering buying this "Box Set" just be sure of what you're actually getting.
summary: This is not an actual "Box Set" as there's no BOX.
Title: Father Dowling Mysteries: The Complete Series

reviewerName: Julia Hursh "Surviving the remote ranch life"
reviewText: My family and I just loved watching each and every episode!!  Great mysteries and acting!!  Sure with the series could have run longer.... Very happy with product and service!!!
summary: Wish it could have been a longer series
Title: Father Dowling Mysteries: The Complete Series

reviewText: If you enjoy mysteries, you will enjoy the stories and characters. These shows remind me of "cozy" mysteries which I read regularly.
Title: Father Dowling Mysteries: The Complete Series

reviewText: I ordered the whole set (3 seasons) and am in the midst of watching Season 2. I loved Season 1. The little plastic holder for the first DVD in Season 2 case is broken, but I got it fixed back, and it's not a big enough deal to send it back. It was a great series, and I'm glad it's now on DVD.
Title: Father Dowling Mysteries: The Complete Series

reviewText: Purchased directly from Amazon.Finally, Father Dowling is released to DVD.  Definitely a must-have for the fan of light-hearted murder-mysteries. No gory death scenes, mostly fun, and always entertaining storylines in each episode.The video quality on the discs are fine for the age of the original show. No complaints here. They don't look like they're re-mastered, but even playing on my HD television, the quality and clarity was quite good, especially considering that they're recorded in standard definition.This is a good purchase (or gift) for anyone who enjoys similar shows like: Matlock, Monk, Poirot, Columbo, Psych, and Murder She Wrote (Cabot Cove episodes), etc.
summary: Father Dowling and Sister "Steve" made it to DVD, hooray!
Title: Father Dowling Mysteries: The Complete Series

reviewText: I HAD NEVER WATCHED THE ORIGINAL SERIES WHEN IT 1ST CAME OUT BUT ARE REALLY ENJOYING THIS SET OF STORIES
Title: Father Dowling Mysteries: The Complete Series

reviewText: I saw this program when it was on TV and liked it so when I found out it came out on DVD I got it.  I really like that a priest goes about solving crimes that the police arrest the wrong person for the crime and he finds the clues to solve the mystery.  He also has help from one of his sisters at the church who is streetwise and knowledgeable about many things.  I especially like the episode "The Consulting Detective Mystery" where Sherlock Holmes has to give him the confidence to go on solving crime when the wrong person gets arrested for a crime committed by someone else.  I would recommend this to anyone who loves mystery shows or crime shows.
Title: Father Dowling Mysteries: The Complete Series

reviewText: My husband and I loved the Father Dowling Mysteries.  Sister was so funny in places, and we loved how they solved mysteries together and endured guests.
Title: Father Dowling Mysteries: The Complete Series

reviewText: I always liked Father Dowling Mysteries when it aired. There are lots of twists and turns in the stories and challenging to figure out the guilty party.
Title: Father Dowling Mysteries: The Complete Series
